item.title: Les yeux jaunes des crocodiles de Katherine Pancol
item.description: About the book Author: Pancol, Katherine, 1954- Title: Les yeux jaunes des crocodiles : roman Publication: Paris : Albin Michel, 2006. ISBN 9782226169983. DAISY audio format narrated by Anne Cartier. CELA library call number DA97648. 651 pages in the print edition; 18 hrs., 10 mins. as a recorded book. About the story This book is also available in English under the title The Yellow Eyes of Crocodiles, although not through the CELA library.
